ewsDetected.recommendation: Engage customer to assess liquidity issues and offer repayment restructuring.

ewsDetected.signal: High Transaction Volume with Small-Value Transfers
ewsDetected.recommendation: Investigate purpose of small transfers to rule out fund diversion.
Monitor salary inflows and enforce EMI prioritization.
Analyze spending patterns and reduce discretionary debits.
Verify loan repayment status and monitor EMIs.
Educate customer on maintaining stable balances.
